answers.answer: They do the test at 28wks but if you continue to feel that way call ahead and get checked by your doctor. With my last pregnancy I was always having headaches and feeling light headed. I ended up with gestational diabetes. Make and earlier appt if you continue to feel that way. Good luck hun
They did mine at my last appointment when I was 23 weeks
I will be having mine next week I'll be 26 weeks.
I was late on mine. 29 weeks. But the doctor  said between 24 and 28 weeks is usually  when they do it.
I just did mine today at 26 weeks
They do it between 25-28weeks at my doctor. You can akways call the nurse at the doctors office. And bring up your concerns. But you should be eating every 2-3 hours smaller meals. That should help

I was around 20 wks. Having symptoms. I told my dr and he had me go take the glucose test early. I ended up having GD. I'm now 37 wks preg. I was diet controlled  until about 25 wks. Then got put on insulin
Sounds like you have it call your doctor

I was light headed, near the point of fainting several times and was tested twice for gd diabetes with a negative result. I had to start eating more protein in the morning, staying cool, & getting up slowly from sitting.

I just got tested at 28 weeks and I have it :( I will say more than a handful of times I got light headed and felt like I was going to pass out and I also have blurred vision occasionally which is a big give away! Good luck hopefully you don't have it!!

question: When do they check for gestational diabetes?  Im 22 weeks now.  Wont be going back to my doctor until over 6 months.  I had an episode the other day in the grocery where I was shaky and light headed.  It felt like my sugar had dropped. I get much better after I ate. But my doctor hasn't even mentioned the test yet.  When Did you all have your test done?
title: gestational diabetes
